data_table.description: Medications Reported at Clinic Exam, Generation 3 Exam 2 and New Offspring Spouse Exam 2. Participants were mailed a medication bag with a request to bring in all prescription and non-prescription medication to the clinic. The physician recorded all the medications during the clinic visit. These medications were then coded using the World Health Organization's Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) classifications. Information about the ATC classification system can be found at http://www.whocc.no/atcddd/. See protocol document for more details.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier

variable.name: medname
variable.description: Medication name (character variable)
variable.comment: 1. "NO MEDS LISTED" = there were no medications listed on the form. However, it may not necessarily imply that the participant is not taking any medications. 2. The same drug may be recorded in more than one record for an individual participant. This is because the participant took the medication at more than one strength and/or dose. 3. The text written on the form was preserved "as is". There could be some misspellings, etc.

variable.name: medstren
variable.description: Medication strength (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = Unknown

variable.name: route
variable.description: Medication route

variable.name: mednum
variable.description: Number taken for given period (MEDPER)
variable.comment: 1. This variable should be used in conjunction with MEDPER.

variable.name: medper
variable.description: Period range

variable.name: medprn
variable.description: Medication taken as needed

variable.name: medotc
variable.description: CHECK if over the counter medication
variable.comment: 1. This variable was added to the data collection form after the cycle had started. Those observations are flagged with the code = 8.
variable.value: Variable not present at the time of exam

variable.name: medbag
variable.description: Medication bag with medications brought to exam?
variable.comment: 1. If MEDNAME = "NO MEDS LISTED" then MEDBAG set to 0=NO. 2. MEDBAG =0 means that participants did not bring medications to the exam. Medications can still be reported by the participant.

variable.name: atc_cod1
variable.description: ATC code for medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: This dataset includes all participants who attended Exam 2. If participant did not list any medications, MEDNAME was set to "NO MEDS LISTED" and ATC_COD1 set to "NO_MEDS". NO_CODE = Medication not coded. NO_MEDS = No medications listed.

variable.name: atc_cod2
variable.description: ATC code for second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or single drug

variable.name: atc_cod3
variable.description: ATC code for third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or no third compound

variable.name: atc_cod4
variable.description: ATC code for fourth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or no fourth compound

variable.name: system1
variable.description: Description/label for anatomical main group - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds or not coded

variable.name: system2
variable.description: Description/label for anatomical main group - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or single drug

variable.name: system3
variable.description: Description/label for anatomical main group - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or no third compound

variable.name: system4
variable.description: Description/label for anatomical main group - fourth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or no fourth compound

variable.name: ther_gp1
variable.description: Description/label for therapeutic subgroup - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or first drug does not have therapeutic subgroup specified

variable.name: ther_gp2
variable.description: Description/label for therapeutic subgroup - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or second drug does not have therapeutic subgroup specified

variable.name: ther_gp3
variable.description: Description/label for therapeutic subgroup - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or third drug does not have therapeutic subgroup specified

variable.name: ther_gp4
variable.description: Description/label for therapeutic subgroup - fourth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or fourth drug does not have therapeutic subgroup specified

variable.name: phrm_gp1
variable.description: Description/label for pharmacological subgroup - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or first drug does not have pharmacological subgroup specified

variable.name: phrm_gp2
variable.description: Description/label for pharmacological subgroup - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or second drug does not have pharmacological subgroup specified

variable.name: phrm_gp3
variable.description: Description/label for pharmacological subgroup - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or third drug does not have pharmacological subgroup specified

variable.name: phrm_gp4
variable.description: Description/label for pharmacological subgroup - fourth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or fourth drug does not have pharmacological subgroup specified

variable.name: chem_gp1
variable.description: Description/label for chemical subgroup - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or first drug does not have chemical subgroup specified

variable.name: chem_gp2
variable.description: Description/label for chemical subgroup - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or second drug does not have chemical subgroup specified

variable.name: chem_gp3
variable.description: Description/label for chemical subgroup - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or third drug does not have chemical subgroup specified

variable.name: chem_gp4
variable.description: Description/label for chemical subgroup - fourth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or fourth drug does not have chemical subgroup specified

variable.name: chem_nm1
variable.description: Description/label for chemical substance - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or first drug does not have chemical substance specified

variable.name: chem_nm2
variable.description: Description/label for chemical substance - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or second drug does not have chemical substance specified

variable.name: chem_nm3
variable.description: Description/label for chemical substance - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or third drug does not have chemical substance specified

variable.name: chem_nm4
variable.description: Description/label for chemical substance - fourth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or fourth drug does not have chemical substance specified
